channel.title: Rate my game, please!
channel.description:
[url=http://awepsyte.50webs.com/BehendigheidsSpel/Spelletje.html]My game[/url]. Please rate it, and post your score, after playing :D The [url=http://awepsyte.50webs.com/BehendigheidsSpel/testGame.java]source code[/url] and [url=http://awepsyte.50webs.com/BehendigheidsSpel/blokkendoos.JPG]the background img[/url]. You also need [url=http://awepsyte.50webs.com/BehendigheidsSpel/Misc.class]this[/url]. Put it in the same directory as the game code.
[b]Only for personal use, please DON'T edit it (except for the starting speed, coz i know, it's too slow), without my permission. If you put it on the web [u]FULL CREDITS TO ME[/u], and a link to [url=http://awepsyte.50webs.com]my site[/url] please.[b]
NOTE: If you can't get the background img, it's also [url=http://www.deblokkendoosvzw.be/img/LOGO.gif]here[/url]. But you need to edit it a little, so it isn't that dark anymore, yourself. NOTE 2: I probably didn't do this the most effective and lag-free way, as you may have noticed, suggestions on how to improve stuff are highly appreciated. PS: I got 14212

item.title: Rate my game, please!
item.dc:creator: @supamagier supamagier
item.description:
@supamagier wrote:

I’m assuming the 1-voters didn’t even take the time to have a look at it and play it, so I rather ignore them

Thanks for your commands Hiaburi and ReZZy`. :)[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 28, 2008, 10:47:16 AM[/size][hr]oh btw, if you like it, I could use some rep

Read full topic

item.title: Rate my game, please!
item.dc:creator: @ReZZy ReZZy`
item.description:
@ReZZy wrote:

Really seems like an easy game, not really though.
It’s actually kind of fun, addicting.

Who ever rates this low has a bad taste in intellect.

Read full topic

item.title: Rate my game, please!
item.dc:creator: @Hiaburi Hiaburi
item.description:
@Hiaburi wrote:

I see you are supposed to start with 3 lives? i lose instantly, the second i fall or hop to high… gave it a 9, very nice, very simple, and very addictive…

item.title: Rate my game, please!
item.dc:creator: @supamagier supamagier
item.description:
@supamagier wrote:

compile the .java to a .class, put this code in a file (notepad)

<HTML>
<BODY>
<APPLET CODE="FILENAME.class" WIDTH=580 HEIGHT=600></APPLET>
</BODY>
</HTML>

and replace FILENAME.class with the name of the class file, save it as NAME.html
and run it.

Read full topic

item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

[quote=“supamagier, post:34, topic:190741”]What Bryanc said, put that in a file called ‘name.html’ and put it in the same directory as the .class file. :)[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 21, 2008, 11:00:02 AM[/size][hr][quote author=Taharok link=topic=254274.msg2124995#msg2124995 date=1206130742]

=D

And could some1 please explain that Object Orientation to me, in short? Any1 who can explain it fast, and knows how it works please? I would really appreciate that.

thx

~Supamagier

Doing what Ollie said is object orientation.
[/quote]

I noticed -.- But how exactly does it work, and what are the advantages of it? Need to know that ;)[/quote]

Object Orientation makes the code easier to read. I guess it could slightly help on the processing, but I would imagine it would be a slight difference.
